workshoptitle: MySQL Heatwave Lakehouse: Realtime Asset Maintenance

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Explore how Oracle MySQL Heatwave Lakehouse help the business in monitoring the Operational metrics and optimizing the supply chain using the Out of the box AI and ML capabilities of OCI. The workshop covers the exceptional features of MySQL Heatwave Lakehouse which helps customers to focus on data platform innovations.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Demo Compartment and ObjectStore Buckets and upload Data
tutorials.description: Create Demo Compartment and ObjectStore Buckets and upload Data

tutorials.title: Lab 2a: Create VCN and Compartment for workshop
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through user setup and configuration and puts the foundation in place to build the Demo on OCI

tutorials.title: Lab 2b: Create Compute instance for workshop and configure MySQL Shell
tutorials.description: Create compute instance for workshop and configure MySQL Shell.

tutorials.title: Lab 2c: Create MySQL Database System in Oracle Cloud
tutorials.description: Create MySQL Database System first so that later we can enable HeatWave Cluster

tutorials.title: Lab 2d: Enable Lakehouse and Create MFG_SENSOR Database/Table in MySQL Database System
tutorials.description: Create a OCI Data Science notebook and Deploy the ML Model

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Build ML model API to evalaute the probablity of device faiures
Lab 4a: Set up OCI Stream service & Execute Sensor Data Simulator
tutorials.description: set up OCI stream service Execute Sensor Data Simulator

tutorials.title: Lab 4b: Setup Dynamic Group for function to manage stream/objects
tutorials.description: set up OCI stream service Execute Sensor Data Simulator

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Set up and Deploy OCI function and connect to service connector Hub
tutorials.description: Set up and Deploy OCI function and connect to service connector Hub

tutorials.description: Set up OCI Dataflow and deploy a Pyspark Application
